title: Sound On: Biden Backs Abortion Filibuster, EPA Authority Ruling (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Biden Backs Abortion Filibuster, EPA Authority Ruling (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Bloomberg Government Congress reporter Emily Wilkins was today's host.

Guests: Congresswoman Sara Jacobs discussed President Biden's support to eliminate the filibuster to codify abortion rights, the Supreme Court ruling on the EPA's authority, the US-China competition bill and legislation on tech and reproductive privacy. Greg Stohr, Bloomberg Supreme Court reporter discussed the end of the Supreme Court's tumultuous term, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis discussed the prospects for ending the filibuster to codify abortion rights, the Biden administration's handling of high inflation and if the Jan 6 committee hearing revelations will impact a potential presidential run for Donald Trump. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
